info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:22PM PDT until August 04 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM PDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MODOC COUNTY... At 621 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tionesta, or 40 miles northwest of Alturas, moving southeast at 25 mph over Highway 139. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Modoc County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
